parameters: *Looks like my parents are home already...*
Mom: Marvin! Where were you? We've been worried sick!!
Brother: What?! Mi wintendo? Broken? Did you use it
My brother and I made over after that...
We threw the wintendo away and I wasn't able to
go back in time ever again. All if this became nothing
The wintendo stopped working after that day.
I never really came to get along with my family...

to make fun of everyone but I managed to defeat him
I wish my momma gave me five coins so I could buy me

wallet. She also steals things from the Dust store.

Her name? She likes people to call her ¨Zome¨.

with a prodigious memory. I am so very proud of him.
